page.title: Messages
page.t: The Price of [blue]%s[/blue] = [red]%s[/red]. This is lower than minimum price of good ([green]%s[/green]).
The Price of [blue]%s[/blue] = [red]%s[/red]. This is greater or equal maximum price of good ([green]%s[/green]).
The Storage of the your station [blue]%s[/blue] is full.
Station [blue]%s[/blue]: Product [blue]%s[/blue] price will update between [green]%s[/green] and [green]%s[/green].
